alert.note: Alert for Baldwin; Butts; Crawford; Henry; Jasper; Jones; Lamar; Monroe; Morgan; Newton; Putnam; Upson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 18 at 11:51AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Baldwin, southern Morgan, western Putnam, Monroe, southeastern Henry, east central Upson, Butts, north central Crawford, northern Jones, Jasper, southern Newton and southeastern Lamar Counties through 1230 PM EDT... At 1151 AM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms extended from near Rocky Plains to near Collier to near Salem, and moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Eatonton, Jackson, Madison, Forsyth, Gray, Monticello, Newborn, Flovilla, Mansfield, Jenkinsburg, Shady Dale, Culloden, Buckhead, Stewart, Turtle Cove, Wayside, Round Oak, Eudora, McElheneys Crossroads and Collier. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Baldwin; Butts; Crawford; Henry; Jasper; Jones; Lamar; Monroe; Morgan; Newton; Putnam; Upson
